ratings.comment: I had Levi as a professor for the 2nd time and had the same positive experiences as my first time. He is hilarious and very charismatic.  He is respected by his students and is very good at keeping the class engaged and involved. His lectures are interactive and provide authentic language for us to use. I wish I could take another portuguese class.

Levi is now of my favorite professors. He is passionate about what he teaches and it is clear that he wants all his students to succeed. He creates a comfortable environment for students to participate and be lively while also keeping us focused and on track. I enjoy coming into class and learning because of his teaching style and personality.

Levi is my favorite professor I've ever had. He is so engaging, and a really effective teacher of Portuguese. I learned so much in little time. He's very approachable, understanding, funny, and kind. I definitely recommend taking a class taught by him.
